solution_line_template: From his second job, Mike receives ${second_job_pay_per_hour}/hour * {second_job_hours_per_week} hours = $<<{second_job_pay_per_hour}*{second_job_hours_per_week}={second_job_earnings}>>{second_job_earnings}.
He therefore earned ${total_wages} – ${second_job_earnings} = $<<{total_wages}-{second_job_earnings}={first_job_earnings}>>{first_job_earnings} from his first job.
